Package decks

Class BlueCardDeck

java.lang.Object
decks.Deck
decks.BlueCardDeck
public class BlueCardDeck
extends Deck
Class implementing the deck containing the blue cards

This deck contains 7 unique blue cards, generated and shuffled at the start of the game. The seven cards correspond to the seven possible careers indicated in the machine project specifications: lawsuit, salary tax due, tip the server, ski accident, computer repair, world cup, and F1 race

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int NUM_BLUE_CARDS
    The machine project specifications state that there must be 7 blue cards.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BlueCardDeck()
    Creates a blue card deck object

  • Field Details

    • NUM_BLUE_CARDS

      public static final int NUM_BLUE_CARDS
      The machine project specifications state that there must be 7 blue cards.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • BlueCardDeck

      public BlueCardDeck()
      Creates a blue card deck object

      In particular, a blue card deck object is initialized as follows:

      • The name is initialized to "Blue Card Deck".
      • The number of blue cards inside this deck initially is 7.

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public java.util.ArrayList<Card> generate()
      Returns the initial (unshuffled) set of blue cards to be stored inside this deck

      There are a total of 7 unique blue cards, corresponding to the seven possible cards indicated in the machine project specifications: Lawsuit(Blue), Salary Tax Due, Tip the Server, Ski Accident, Computer Repair, World Cup, and F1 Race.

      Once this method is called inside the constructor to generate the initial set of cards, re-calling this method will simply return a set of cards but will not affect the cards inside the deck.

      Specified by:
      generate in class Deck
      Returns:
      initial (unshuffled) set of career cards to be stored inside this deck

    • drawFromDeck

      public BlueCard drawFromDeck()
      Returns the topmost card inside this deck (that is, the blue card drawn by the player)

      The career card deck will never be empty since the players do not keep the drawn blue cards; hence, the cards are effectively never removed from the deck.

      Returns:
      topmost card that is drawn by the player
